alert.note: Alert for Harris; Muscogee (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 27 at 10:14AM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Muscogee and Harris Counties through 1100 AM EDT... At 1014 AM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Bartletts Ferry Dam, or 8 miles north of Smiths, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Columbus, Hamilton, Waverly Hall, North Fort Benning, Bibb City, Upatoi, Goat Rock Lake, Ellerslie, Laurel Hills, Green Island Hills, Vista Terrace, Cataula, Columbus Metropolitan Airport, Rose Hill, Mountain Hill, Benning Hills, Avondale, Benning Park, Fortson and Pine Mountain Valley. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 AM EDT for west central Georgia.
